headline: Bristol-Myers Squibb (NYSE:BMY) Appoints Cari Gallman As New General Counsel
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb (NYSE:BMY) recently appointed Cari Gallman as the new Executive Vice President, General Counsel, and Chief Policy Officer following Sandra Leung’s retirement. This leadership change might have influenced investors' outlook on the company, contributing to a 3% increase in share price over the last week. However, this movement aligns with the overall market trend, which saw a rise of 2%. Moreover, broader market dynamics, including investor focus on impending Federal...

headline: Bristol Myers Squibb announces $40bn US investment plan over five years
summary: The funds will reportedly be allocated for R&D, technology advancements, and enhancing domestic manufacturing capacity.
